mapper.select: SELECT t.`reimburseId` AS reimburseId , createtime,totalcount,`event`,statusid, (SELECT `statusName` FROM `tbstatus` AS tb1 WHERE tb1.`statusId`=t.`statusId`) AS statusName, (SELECT `employeeName` FROM `employee` AS e WHERE e.`employeeId` =t.`nextDealMan` ) AS nextName, e.`employeeId`,`employeeName`,e.`departmentId`,e.`positionId`, (SELECT `departmentName` FROM `department` AS d WHERE d.`departmentId` =e.`departmentId`) AS `departmentName`, (SELECT `positionName` FROM `position` AS p WHERE p.`positionId` =e.`positionId`) AS `positionName`, `id`,`subTotal`,`desc`,`pictureName`,`picturePath`, `checkId`,`checkTime`,(SELECT `employeeName` FROM `employee` AS e2 WHERE e2.`employeeId` =t1.`checkMan` ) AS checkManName, (SELECT `resultName` FROM `checkresult` AS tb WHERE tb.`resultId` =t1.`checkResult`) AS resultName,`checkComment` FROM `tbreimburse` AS t INNER JOIN `employee` AS e ON t.`createMan`=e.`employeeId` LEFT JOIN `reimbursedetail` AS r ON r.`mainId` =t.`reimburseId` LEFT JOIN `tbcheck` AS t1 ON t1.`bizId`=t.`reimburseId` AND t1.`typeId`=2 WHERE t.`reimburseId` =#{tbId}
